definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: opposition, contrariness;—only [[קֶָרִי]]([[בְּ]]) in Le 26, as adv. modifier of [[הָלַךְ]] (in fig. sense), + [[עִם]] pers., of Isr.’s relation to ´[[י]]:: [[תֵּלְכוּ עִמִּי קָָרִי]] Le 26:21 if ye walk with me contrariwise, so v:Le 26:23, [[בְּקָָרִי]] v:Le 26:27, v:Le 26:40; ´[[י]]: subj [[בַּקֶָּרִי וְהָלַכְתי עִמָּכֶם]] v:Le 26:24, so v:Le 26:41 and (´[[בַּחֲמַת ק]]: in wrath of opositioin) v:Le 26:28.
